inst.name: Nop
inst.description: NO Operation. Mostly used to align next instruction on even offset.

inst.name: Evt_end
inst.description: Exit current function and return a value.

inst.name: Evt_next
inst.description: Wait for any player input (for example to answer a Yes/No question), before executing further script instructions.

inst.name: Evt_chain
inst.description: Reinitialize script execution data before executing new function ?

inst.name: Evt_exec
inst.description: This instruction will execute the embedded two-byte instruction if the condition is true. When condition is 0xff, instruction is executed whenever there is a camera switch. Several instructions can be defined to be called when condition is true.

inst.name: Evt_kill
inst.description: *MAYBE* Disable an event.

inst.name: Ifel_ck
inst.description: IF block instruction start. Any following Ck instruction evaluated to FALSE will end this block.

inst.name: Else_ck
inst.description: ELSE block instruction start. Block to execute if precedent IF block must be stopped if some condition evaluated to FALSE. Note: it's either IF/ENDIF, or IF/ELSE; there is no IF/ELSE/ENDIF sequence.

inst.name: Endif
inst.description: IF block instruction end. Exit current IF instruction block.

inst.name: Sleep
inst.description: Initialize Sleep. In the bytecode, you will find bytes 09 0a NN NN, and the script will only add 1 to current bytecode position for instruction 0x09, to get to instruction 0x0a, and process the sleep loop.

field.name: count
field.description: Number of game ticks to sleep. Game logic runs at 30 Hz, so 30 ticks per second.

inst.name: Sleeping
inst.description: Execute Sleep. Current event instructions will not be executed for the duration of sleep.

inst.name: Wsleep
inst.description: *MAYBE* Initialize global sleep.

inst.name: Wsleeping
inst.description: *MAYBE* Execute global sleep. All events instructions will not be executed for the duration of sleep.

inst.name: For
inst.description: Initialize FOR loop. Execute a block of instructions 'count' times.

inst.name: Next
inst.description: End of FOR block.

inst.name: While
inst.description: Start of WHILE block. Execute a block of instructions unless a following Ck condition is evaluated to FALSE.

inst.name: Ewhile
inst.description: End of WHILE block.

inst.name: Do
inst.description: Start of DO block. Execute a block of instructions (condition at end of block).

inst.name: Edwhile
inst.description: End of DO block. Execute the block of instructions as long as the following Ck condition(s) are evaluated to TRUE.

inst.name: Switch
inst.description: Start of SWITCH block. Execute a block of instructions depending on the value of 'varw' variable.

inst.name: Case
inst.description: Start of CASE block. Execute a block of instructions if 'varw' variable of Switch instruction equals 'value'.

inst.name: Default
inst.description: Start of DEFAULT block. Execute a block of instructions if none of preceding Case instructions matches.

inst.name: Eswitch
inst.description: End of SWITCH block.

inst.name: Goto
inst.description: Jump to another instruction in current event. 'rel_offset' is relative to start of this instruction.

inst.name: Gosub
inst.description: Execute a subroutine for this event.

inst.name: Return
inst.description: End a subroutine called with Gosub.

inst.name: Break
inst.description: Exit a currently executing block (For, Case, Do, etc).

inst.name: Work_copy
inst.description: Change instruction by writing value inside script. 'varw' is the variable we want to write at offset 'offset' (relative to start of next instruction). 'size' tells if we write a byte or a word.

inst.name: Ck
inst.description: Test a bit in a given array

inst.name: Set
inst.description: Set a bit in a given array

inst.name: Cmp
inst.description: Compares a value.

inst.name: Save
inst.description: Sets value of a variable.

inst.name: Copy
inst.description: Copies a variable to another variable.

inst.name: Cut_chg
inst.description: Change camera. Save current camera for restoration using Cut_old.

inst.name: Cut_old
inst.description: Restore camera changed by instruction Cut_chg.

inst.name: Message_on
inst.description: Prints text.

inst.name: Obj_model_set
inst.description: Defines 3D model to use for an object.

inst.name: Pos_set
inst.description: Defines entity position.

inst.name: Sce_espr_on
inst.description: Defines 3D animation using sprites.

inst.name: Door_aot_set
inst.description: Defines rectangular door.

inst.name: Plc_ret
inst.description: *MAYBE* Exit status screen.

inst.name: Sce_em_set
inst.description: Defines entity (enemy, other character).

inst.name: Aot_reset
inst.description: *MAYBE* Reset object state

inst.name: Aot_on
inst.description: *MAYBE* Enable object

inst.name: Sce_espr_kill
inst.description: Stops animation.

inst.name: Xa_on
inst.description: Play a sound.

inst.name: Sce_shake_on
inst.description: Shakes screen.

inst.name: Mizu_div_set
inst.description: Defines water level (mizu = water in japanese).

inst.name: Kage_set
inst.description: Defines entity/player shadow (kage = shadow in japanese)

inst.name: Sce_Item_lost
inst.description: Removes item from inventory.

inst.name: Door_aot_set_4p
inst.description: Defines non-rectangular door.

inst.name: Light_pos_set
inst.description: Defines light position.

inst.name: Light_kido_set
inst.description: Defines light range.

inst.name: Movie_on
inst.description: Play movie file

inst.name: Poison_ck
inst.description: Check poisoned status

inst.name: Poison_clr
inst.description: Clear poisoned status
